a mithril-edged large iron cube

Saturday, September 2nd, 2017, 3:19:38 PM

Just found this in a box, and Google doesn't come up with anything. I know that raising it casts Minor Elemental Edge. Anyone know if it's more special than that? Maybe wizard/merchant rechargeable? Maybe even self-charging?

It appears to have no zests.

@Wyrom help!

```

look cube The words "I may contain the answers to life itself..." are clearly visible on one side of the cube, while "Or I may be a very sick joke..." can be seen on the opposite. The only remaining words on the cube are "Limited Edition" with a small set of numbers stamped on it. There appears to be something written on it. ```

```

read cub In the Common language, it reads: 6 of 10 ```

``` raise cube You raise your large iron cube skyward! 1d100: 100 + Modifiers: 165 == 265

Your large iron cube glows brightly for a moment, but the glow becomes dull and fades. Cast Roundtime 3 Seconds. ```
